title: >>> Harder, Better, Faster, STRONGER
body_text:
The biggest event since DODGEBALL 100.
The first Finale in Year 3 ... What a show it is going to be.
Here is your official DODGEBALL CX preview.
TraCX
This 110th spectacular welcomes the second volume of the critically acclaimed DODGEBALL 100 soundtrack,
OH Tracks!
.
Like its predecessor,
TraCX
will feature a variety of kick-ass hits from chart-topping artists and bands of yesterday and today, beginning with the official theme song "Stronger" by
Kanye West
. Throw in some Motorhead, Beastie Boys, Flyleaf, and Gym Class Heroes and you've got one rockin' soundtrack.
Beyond the Perimeter!
What would a ten event be without some color! The wild decorations are very popular among fans and this time color will spread beyond the perimeter! Be on the lookout!
DODGEBALL CX1 Announcement!
Think DODGEBALL CX is going to rock the house? You'd be damn right about that! And with its conclusion comes the introduction of the unprecendented 12th season. Keep your ears open during CX as the DODGEBALL CX1 match-up will be unveiled!
ALISON BERTSCH
>> Record of 1-4-1. Debuted at DODGEBALL VII.
Only female "Powerhouse Thrower" award winner; arguably the toughest woman in history taking some of the most vicious bulletball shots and not once has complained.
MIKE BUTLER
>> Record of 1-1-0. Debuted at DODGEBALL SIXTY IX.
Quick, agile, powerful, accurate - perhaps the most well-rounded talent of the four; will take it to the limit.
MELISSA KERR
>> Has never been captain. Debuted at DODGEBALL XL.
Successful softball background has made her arguably the most dominant offensive female force ever; nicknamed the "Giant Killer" / "Killer Kerr".
MIKE "SPUTZ" KROTT
>> Has never been captain. Debuted at D-DAY 5.
Could easily be argued as the greatest catcher in the history of the game; has suffered several broken bones over the course of his career and refuses to quit.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
There isn't a question that this 110th spectacle will be something to remember. Catch the drama, experience the thrill, feel the electricity of this blockbuster on November 3!
And be sure to check back at the end of the week for the final preview.
body_html:
The biggest event since DODGEBALL 100.
The first Finale in Year 3 ... What a show it is going to be.
Here is your official DODGEBALL CX preview.


TraCX
This 110th spectacular welcomes the second volume of the critically acclaimed DODGEBALL 100 soundtrack, OH Tracks!.

Like its predecessor, TraCX will feature a variety of kick-ass hits from chart-topping artists and bands of yesterday and today, beginning with the official theme song "Stronger" by Kanye West. Throw in some Motorhead, Beastie Boys, Flyleaf, and Gym Class Heroes and you've got one rockin' soundtrack.

Beyond the Perimeter!
What would a ten event be without some color! The wild decorations are very popular among fans and this time color will spread beyond the perimeter! Be on the lookout!

DODGEBALL CX1 Announcement!
Think DODGEBALL CX is going to rock the house? You'd be damn right about that! And with its conclusion comes the introduction of the unprecendented 12th season. Keep your ears open during CX as the DODGEBALL CX1 match-up will be unveiled!



ALISON BERTSCH
>> Record of 1-4-1. Debuted at DODGEBALL VII.
Only female "Powerhouse Thrower" award winner; arguably the toughest woman in history taking some of the most vicious bulletball shots and not once has complained.

MIKE BUTLER
>> Record of 1-1-0. Debuted at DODGEBALL SIXTY IX.
Quick, agile, powerful, accurate - perhaps the most well-rounded talent of the four; will take it to the limit.

MELISSA KERR
>> Has never been captain. Debuted at DODGEBALL XL.
Successful softball background has made her arguably the most dominant offensive female force ever; nicknamed the "Giant Killer" / "Killer Kerr".

MIKE "SPUTZ" KROTT
>> Has never been captain. Debuted at D-DAY 5.
Could easily be argued as the greatest catcher in the history of the game; has suffered several broken bones over the course of his career and refuses to quit.

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~


There isn't a question that this 110th spectacle will be something to remember. Catch the drama, experience the thrill, feel the electricity of this blockbuster on November 3!

And be sure to check back at the end of the week for the final preview.
